java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.CellEditorListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener, javax.swing.event.TableColumnModelListener, javax.swing.event.TableModelListener, javax.swing.Scrollable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AccountTable, ANNPageModule, ANNResultModule, EquationTable, GAResultModule, GARulesPageModule, GPPageInitialPopulationModule, GPResultModule, PaperTradeResultModule, PortfolioTableModule, QuoteModule, StockHoldingTable, TransactionModule, WatchScreenModule
public class AbstractTable
extends SortedTable

Helper for constructing tables. The abstract table sets up the look & feel for tables in Venice. It also provides column sorting and helper methods for expression columns.

Author:
Andrew Leppard
See Also:
AbstractTableModel, Column, ExpressionColumn, Serialized Form

showColumns

protected void showColumns(AbstractTableModel model)
Set the model which describes the table's columns.

Parameters:
model - Table model.

createShowColumnMenu

protected javax.swing.JMenu createShowColumnMenu(AbstractTableModel model)
Helper method to create and return the "show columns" menu which allows the user to select which columns are visible.

Parameters:
model - Table model.

applyExpressions

protected void applyExpressions(AbstractQuoteModel model)
Helper method to display a dialog to let the user set expressions. The user can input expressions which are compiled and run against all the quotes in the table. The results are shown in columns which are made visible.

Parameters:
model - Quote table model.
